projects: [{"title":"Babyshop High Potential Program (Babyshop HiPOS)","start_date":"Aug 2011","description":"The High Potential Program stemmed from the business premise of wanting to develop their talent pipeline within Babyshop. This two year development journey gave next in line leadership an opportunity to discover and practice both their management and leadership skills. Not only was this a journey of self discovery but a reality check on what is cutting edge practice from both a management and leadership perspective."},{},{},{"title":"LMG Competency Framework","description":"Developed the LMG Competency Framework ( Core & Behavioral) from scratch , right from conceptualization to implementation."},{},{},{},{},{}]
